EmailTemplate.description: Email sent to staffing applicants when no comms
EmailTemplate.name: Staffing Withdrawn due to lack of comms
EmailTemplate.subject: Withdrawal from The Challenge summer application process
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Challenge Network
YOU HAVE BEEN WITHDRAWN FROM THE APPLICATION PROCESS
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
I have tried to contact you on numerous occasions by telephone and by email in order to further your application to The Challenge.
Due to the fact that I have been unable to reach you, I am writing to you to inform you that we have withdrawn you from the application process.
If this is an error, please contact me using the contact details below and I will reopen your application.
Thank you for your interest in The Challenge.
Best wishes,
{!Contact.OwnerFullName} The Challenge Network t: {!Contact.OwnerPhone} e: {!Contact.OwnerEmail}
WWW.THE-CHALLENGE.ORG /thechallengeNETWORK
The Challenge Network Ltd is registered in England and Wales, no 6845451. Registered charity no. 1129239. Registered address: 75 Westminster Bridge Road, London SE1 7HS
